review: It's a great little device that brings all your TV and movie needs into one. It's  easy to setup  and navigate. At times it can be slow or stop altogether which is a bummer and the in no definitive way to turn it off. You have the option of going into the setting menu and putting it to sleep or unplugging the power supply. It would be nice to have something on the main menu or even the controller to turn it off/put it to sleep.
author: Aaron Moore

review: I appreciated the instructions that said that the set up connection would take a few minutes. That helped to not worry everything was OK because the set up did in fact take almost 10 minutes.The interface is just like the Kindle and it is very snappy and responsive to flipping through movie/tv options. The app download of Netflix went easily and that app maybe doesn't load quite as fast as Amazon movies but it is still pretty snappy.Overall this was a great low-end tech investment. We were using an HDMI cord from our computer to our TV so the biggest appeal for us with this device was the remote.Great product overall and for the price point (which we purchased under a special Prime member-only sale) was fab.
author: Wendy E. Almeida
